text: Does anyone have any idea where to get the exact live time for a soccer event? Many providers are a little imprecise. The time on the Betfair website is about 1-2 minutes delayed. I need the time quite accurately for my model.

elements.text: Does anyone have any idea where to get the exact live time for a soccer event? Many providers are a little imprecise. The time on the Betfair website is about 1-2 minutes delayed. I need the time quite accurately for my model.

text: <@U01C12ZEADQ> Yes, the exact start would be enough. From then on I can count myself, correct?. I can’t take the planned kickoff time. Information about stoppage time would be good too.

text: I just account for the imprecision when determining the minimum difference between my fair price and market price. Sacrificing pnl but hopefully not as much as it costs to get a precise feed / or time investment into hooking into the opta feed I reckon.

elements.text: I just account for the imprecision when determining the minimum difference between my fair price and market price. Sacrificing pnl but hopefully not as much as it costs to get a precise feed / or time investment into hooking into the opta feed I reckon.

text: I try and compute it where possible, rather than use the time reported by Betfair, but the inplayservice often has bogus timestamps for the kickoff/second half kickoff events, so they are practically useless most of the time
